title: Shimla-Kufri Road Partially Closed
description: Road repair work ongoing between Mall Road junction and Kufri. Expect delays of 30-45 minutes. Alternate route via Chharabra available.

title: Diwali Festival Celebrations
description: Annual Diwali celebrations happening at City Palace and surrounding areas. Special light displays and cultural performances. Expect increased crowds.

title: Monsoon Season Beginning
description: Light rains expected. Best time for lush greenery and reduced crowds. Carry umbrellas and waterproof gear.

title: Misty Season - Limited Visibility
description: Dense mist expected during mornings and evenings. Reduces visibility but creates magical landscape photography opportunities.

title: Toy Train Maintenance - Limited Schedule
description: Heritage toy train operating on limited schedule due to maintenance. Book in advance for guaranteed seats.
